name: jslib
description: utils library, consist of three sub-package: es5, es6, style

scripts.install: npm run install-es5 && npm run install-es6 && npm run install-style
scripts.clean: npm run clean-es5 && npm run clean-es6 && npm run clean-style
scripts.build-es5: cd es5 && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-es6: cd es6 && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-style: cd style && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build-es5 && npm run build-es6 && npm run build-style

author: Beeno Tung <aabbcc1241@yahoo.com.hk>
